ce.name: guide_1
ce.stringProp: The purpose of this lesson is to explain the Shutdown Procedure.

ce.name: guide_3
ce.stringProp: See Daily Training Schedule in the Introduction section of this guide.

ce.name: guide_5
ce.stringProp: Shutdown Procedure Instructor Guide or Student Guide

ce.name: guide_6
ce.stringProp: Review the 1C-46(K)A-1, Flight Crew Operations Manual (FCOM).

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: The purpose of this lesson is to explain the Shutdown Procedure.

ppc.name: properties
ppc.stringProp: The learning objective of this lesson is as follows:

storyboard.title: Parking brake - Set C or F/O graphics
ENGINE ANTI–ICE switches - Off F/O graphics
SEAT BELTS selector - OFF F/O graphics
FUEL PUMP and TANK switches - Off F/O graphics
LEFT and RIGHT ISOLATION switches - On F/O graphics

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: Supplementary procedures are accomplished as required rather than routinely performed on each flight. Procedures accomplished in flight, or those that are an alternate means of accomplishing normal procedures, are usually accomplished by memory. Infrequently used procedures, not normally accomplished are usually accomplished by reference.

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: The following is an example of supplementary procedures related to the Shutdown Procedure that would be referenced instead of accomplished by memory:

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: Operation With Less Than Nominal External Power Source – Shutdown Procedure

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: Various supplementary procedures will be covered in more depth in later lessons and device trainers.

ppc.name: properties
ppc.stringProp: When setting the hydraulic panel during the Shutdown Procedure, which pump selector is set to OFF first?

ppc.name: properties
ppc.stringProp: During the Shutdown Procedure, power off _______________ to prevent overheat.

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: The purpose of this lesson was to explain the Shutdown Procedure.

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: Open the QRH on you Electronic Flight Bag (EFB) to follow along with the Secure Procedure. Follow the instructions provided to complete the Shutdown Procedure:

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: Crew Position References are as follows:

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: The steps in the Shutdown Procedure are as follows:  (continued)

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp:
If towing is needed:

Establish communications with ground handling personnel. (C)

Verify that the nose gear steering is locked out. (C)

Set or release the parking brake as directed by ground handling personnel. (C or F/O)

ce.name: wcn
ce.stringProp: Do not apply rotational force when moving the FUEL CONTROL switch.

ce.name: wcn
ce.stringProp: If the nose gear steering is not locked out, any change to hydraulic power with the tow bar connected may cause unwanted tow bar movement.

ce.name: wcn
ce.stringProp: Do not hold or turn the nose wheel tiller during pushback or towing. This can damage the nose gear or the tow bar.

ce.name: wcn
ce.stringProp: Do not use airplane brakes to stop the airplane during pushback or towing. This can damage the nose gear or the tow bar.

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp:
Center AIR DEMAND pump selector – OFF

L ELEC DEMAND pump selector – OFF

C ELEC 1 and C ELEC 2 PRIMARY pump switches – OFF

R ELEC DEMAND pump selector – OFF

ce.name: wcn
ce.stringProp: Depressurize the right system last to prevent fluid transfer between systems.

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: Start the Shutdown Procedure after taxi is complete. The steps in the Shutdown Procedure are as follows:

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: Verify that the PARKING BRAKE SET message is shown.

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp:
If APU power is needed:

• Verify that the APU RUN light is illuminated.

If external power is needed:

• Verify that the PRIMARY EXTERNAL POWER AVAIL light is illuminated.

• PRIMARY EXTERNAL POWER switch – Push
  Verify that the ON light is illuminated.

If the SECONDARY EXTERNAL POWER AVAIL light is illuminated:

• SECONDARY EXTERNAL POWER switch – Push
  Verify that the ON light is illuminated.

ce.name: paragraph
ce.stringProp: The steps in the Shutdown Procedure are as follows:  (continued)

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: Fuel Pump and Tank Switches – Off (F/O)

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: Left and Right Isolation Switches – On (F/O)

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: Record shown status messages in maintenance log.

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: After wheel chocks are in place:

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: RWR POWER (RWR page of the MCDU) – OFF (F/O)
Power off RWR to prevent overheat, since RWR cooling fans located in the wingtips are inhibited while the Ground Refueling Panel is open.

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: Verify that the APU selector is set as needed.

ce.name: complexInteraction
ce.stringProp: Verify that the flight deck door UNLKD light is illuminated.
